I Love Web Development!

My name is Paul Killian and I am a full-stack web developer. I finally realized I am meant to be a programmer. Ever since I was a child I was fascinated with electronics and as a grew up I built my own computers. Now I am putting my skills to work developing responsive web applications.

I utilize JavaScript, React, CSS3, Bootstrap 4, and HTML5 for the front end and Node.js, Express.js, PostgresSQL, and Nngix for the back end for my applications. I am always looking for new technology to make my applications better.

I am always thrilled to work with a team. In these times during COVID-19, it is vital to know how to work with others over Slack, Zoom, and Github, MeisterTask, and other tools to be sure everything is cohesive and everyone can trust that you are there to do the job or they need your assistance. I know how to work remotely and in-person with a team.

When I am not working I enjoy my family and the beach. I enjoy cooking and learning to build new recipes.
